import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; const EditInformations = () => { const [oldPassword, setOldPassword] = useState(""); const [newPassword, setNewPassword] = useState(""); const [confirmPassword, setConfirmPassword] = useState(""); //traduction const {t} = useTranslation(); // const email = localStorage.getItem("email"); return (
setOldPassword(e.target.value)} />
setNewPassword(e.target.value)} />
setConfirmPassword(e.target.value)} />
) } export default EditInformations
